title: B = land rate per Sq
clause_text: B = land rate per Sq.m. as per the Annual Statement of Rates (ASR) prepared by the Inspector General of Registration for the year in which construction of amenity is commenced.
section: Construction Amenity TDR in Sq.m. = A / B * (2) 1.35 Where,

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
